Everything Spice Grilled Cheese

Published on: 2025-02-03

  • vegetarian

Ingredients

  • Sourdough Bread
  • 1 c grated sharp cheddar
  • 3/4 c grated havarti or fontina cheese
  • 4 T butter
  • 1/4 c Grated parmesan
  • 2–4 t everything bagel spice

Directions

  1. Heat skillet over low. Add butter.
  2. Spread butter on bread. Sprinkle with everything spice and parmesan. Press to adhere.
  3. Put cheddar and havarti on bread.
  4. Put sandwiches in skillet. Cook until golden.

Source: Half-Baked Harvest
